dict.acceptation: （政府的）部；神职；牧师职位；神职任期；

sent.orig: China's Ministry of Agriculture ministry said it expects a steady rise in soybean demand in 2005.
sent.trans: 中国农业部说，预计中国2005年的大豆需求会稳步增长。

sent.orig: CACEM is under the supervision and administration of Ministry of Transport and Ministry of Civil Affairs.
sent.trans: 中国交通企协接受业务主管单位交通部、社团管理机关民政部的业务指导和监督管理。

sent.orig: School is divided into academic and vocational education and training of the Ministry of Education Ministry.
sent.trans: 学校分设学历教育部和职业教育培训部。

sent.orig: Branch ministry: A ministry responsible for just one industry.
sent.trans: 专业部：只负责某一行业的部。

sent.orig: It was similar to the present day Ministry of Agriculture and Ministry of Finance.
sent.trans: 职能类似于现在的农业部和财政部。
